Plot: The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.
Title: The Other Man
Writer: Richard Eyre (screenplay), Charles Wood (screenplay), Bernhard Schlink (short story)
Actors: Laura Linney, Antonio Banderas, Liam Neeson, Romola Garai
tomatoConsensus: Despite the best efforts of a talented cast, The Other Man is talky, witless, and tension-free.
